summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2979, for the improvement of Edmunds Street, from Rainier Avenue to 42nd Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading; by construction of wooden curbs and gutters; by the construction of concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks; and by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35875 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
